snippet: Ahmed Alaiba, who worked as a liaison to the Muslim Brotherhood, has been held without charge for more than two weeks.
abstract: Security forces in Egypt detain Ahmed Alaiba, Egyptian employee of United States Embassy who worked as liaison to the Muslim Brotherhood; move stirs fears of pressure on Western diplomats who communicate with the Islamist opposition.
lead_paragraph: Ahmed Alaiba, who worked as a liaison to the Muslim Brotherhood, has been held without charge for more than two weeks.

headline.main: Security Forces in Egypt Detain Employee of American Embassy
headline.print_headline: Security Forces in Egypt Detain Employee of American Embassy
